channel.title: Daily India News
channel.description: Your daily AI-generated executive briefing covering Top India News, Polity, Law, Economy, Environment, Foreign Policy, Technology, Sports, and Health & Science.

item.title: Feb 24, 2026
item.description: Your daily AI-generated audio briefing on Indian news, covering top stories in Polity, Economy, and Foreign Affairs.

item.title: Feb 25, 2026
item.description: Prime Minister Modi makes history on Instagram and strengthens India's ties with Israel, while the Indian economy shows robust growth. The Supreme Court delivers key rulings on free speech and caste discrimination, and India gears up for a fully digital Census.
